ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_abo: Only resolves the spell above the caster.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_bel: Only resolves the spell below the caster.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_lev: Only resolves the spell at the caster's elevation.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_not: Only resolves the spell if the result of the next Filter is false.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_or: Only resolves the spell if any of the next 2 Filters are true.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_ran: Has a base 50% chance of resolving. If amplified overall, chance will be (100% - 50% / (2 ^ Amplification)). If dampened overall, chance will be (50% / (2 ^ Dampening)).
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_xno: Only resolves the spell if the result of both the next 2 Filters are equal.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_filter_xor: Only resolves the spell if only one of the next 2 Filters are true.
ars_controle.glyph_desc.glyph_precise_de: Delays the remainder of the spell by (2 ^ Extend Time Augments) ticks.
ars_controle.portable_brazier_relay.blac: Ritual of %s can not be portably relayed.
ars_controle.remote.error.different_dime: Target cannot be in different dimension.
ars_controle.target.set.block: Set target to block at %s in %s.
ars_nouveau.page1.block.ars_controle.scr: The Warp Scroll Holder allows you to easily open and close warp portals to your desired destinations. Simply replace one of your portal frames with a Warp Scroll Holder in an appropriate direction and insert a Warp Scroll while having some Source within 10 blocks.

The Scryer's Linkage links to another block, allowing machines to interact with its linked block from distance places. It is capable of linking items, liquids, energy, redstone, and a few other things. To configure it, use a Dominion Wand first on the block you want to link to, then on the linkage.
ars_nouveau.page1.block.ars_controle.tem: The Temporal Stability Sensor shows how unstable the time of the world is. Using a comparator, you can find out how close the world is to lagging, with higher redstone output meaning the world is closer to lagging. You can use this to turn off farms automatically to prevent the server from lagging.
ars_nouveau.page1.block.ars_controle.war: The Warping Spell Prism allows you to warp a spell projectile to anywhere in the world, even across dimensions!
ars_nouveau.page1.item.ars_controle.port: The Portable Brazier Relay allows you to carry the effects of a ritual on you. This requires the ritual brazier to stay loaded and have a supply of source.
ars_nouveau.page1.item.ars_controle.remo:
The Remote lets you remotely configure blocks and entities that the Dominion Wand can.
It has two radial menus, one for configuring which end of the connection is locked (first or second) accessible when holding Shift, and another for the mode of selection (single or multiple) accessible when not holding Shift.
To use it, first crouch and use it on the thing you would like to configure.
ars_nouveau.page2.item.ars_controle.remo:
Then, you can use it again on other blocks or entities depending on what the thing you are configuring accepts.
For example, selecting a Storage Lectern with Locking Last allows you to link inventories with ease.
Selecting a Starbuncle with Locking First would let you select many inventories to deposit items to.
When you are finished, left clicking air will clear the Remote's target.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.adding.bina: %s requires the next two glyphs to be Filters.
%s can not be part of another adaptive Filter.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.adding.unar: %s requires the next glyph to be a Filter.
%s can not adapt another adaptive Filter.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.exists.bina: %s requires the next two glyphs to be Filters.
%s can not be part of another adaptive Filter.
ars_nouveau.spell.validation.exists.unar: %s requires the next glyph to be a Filter.
%s can not adapt another adaptive Filter.
